Html:
Hello I try to run my application on end-user PC, windows 7, net fram. 4.0

when the app try to app the TaksEditDialog show a exption with the message:
"Could not load file or assembly 'TimeSpan2, Version=2.1.3.0...'"

I 'm using the version 2.1.4.0 of these dll, it is in execute path.

Some idea?

Regards!

I met this problem at past, I solved it by using the Nuget Management to specify TimeSpan2 2.1.3 instead of 2.1.4 (VS2015 has this feature).
Hope this helpful.
OMG I'm using VS2012, how can resolve it?

Maybe you can modify the configure file manually, but it is definitely not safe.
I met this problem when I use 2.5.17, If you are use 2.5.17, you can try to upgrade to 2.5.19. Maybe it will be solved.

Hello thanks for your help, I updated to 2.5.19 and now it work ok, buuuuut.... Now I have error when try to GetTast() on WIndows XP, say cannot find file expecified, any idea?

Regards!
Post some demo source code will be helpful to find out the issue.
